title: Ghusl water splashed in mouth & then I swallowed, is my ghusl valid?
transcript: Mill from Germany Assalamu Alaikum Walaikumussalam During the ghusl, water splashes from washing my body part into my nose and it landed in my throat, then I swallowed it. Is my ghusl invalid? No, it is valid. It is valid. www.mooji.org
